Entries.AlexJeric1: Ugh, what do you want?$a#$b#Sorry. Alex is being so weird at the moment, it's left me in a bad mood...$s
Entries.AlexJericMarried: The wedding was so cute, right? I helped Mrs Mullner with the flowers.$h

Entries.AlexJeric1: Damn, Alex really blew up at me and Haley... what's his problem?
Entries.AlexJericMarried: Can't believe I'm a married man! Gotta say, Faye and Emily really helped me nail the fit on those suits. We looked great.$h

Entries.AlexJeric1: I don't want to talk right now. Maybe later. I don't know.$s
Entries.AlexJeric2: ...$a#$b#The annoying thing is... I think you're right.
Entries.AlexJeric3: Thanks again for the talk! It's given me a lot to think about...
Entries.AlexJericMarried: Hey, now I'm living with Jeric I guess this means I'm a farmer too!$h

Entries.AlexJeric1: Alex hasn't been himself lately. I don't suppose you could have a little chat with him?$s
Entries.AlexJeric2: Did you talk to Alex? He's been so quiet, like he has something on his mind...
Entries.AlexJeric3: Did you talk to Alex? He's been so quiet, like he has something on his mind...
Entries.AlexJeric6: Jeric is such a gentleman!$h#$b#I'm glad Alex is courting a nice boy like him.
Hmph. That Jeric lad's been around a lot lately...#$b#He seems alright, I suppose.
